items.summary: Add the newly provided header logo image (the one the user referred to as "this") as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated/ and generate a header-optimized transparent PNG at exactly 112px height (preserve aspect ratio; no distortion; no extra padding unless needed to avoid clipping) using a cache-busting filename.

Update ONLY the SiteHeader logo element (frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeader.tsx, the inside the home Link) to reference the newly generated cache-busted 112px-tall logo asset under /assets/generated/, replacing the current src "/assets/generated/greenplantz-logo-image-9.dim_auto_x112.cb_20260209_01.png".

Ensure the updated SiteHeader logo remains responsive and does not overflow the header height (the header container height is h-16) by adjusting sizing classes on ONLY the same SiteHeader logo element if needed, while maintaining the logoâ€™s aspect ratio.
